thread.title: ​Sridevi and her daughters are setting some serious wedding fashion goals​
thread.title_full: ​Sridevi and her daughters are setting some serious wedding fashion goals​

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: ​Sridevi and her daughters are setting some serious wedding fashion goals​
text:
It was the big fat wedding of Keshav Reddy, son of GVK's Vice-chairman Sanjay Reddy and Veena Reddy, daughter of the pharma tycoon, Chinnappa Reddy, but the Kapoor ladies stole all the limelight!
Sridevi, along with her daughters Jhanvi and Khushi dazzled throughout the star-studded wedding in stunning creations of none other than their favourite designer, Manish Malhotra and we can't keep our eyes off the beautiful trio! From lavish ivory gowns to embellished brocade lehengas, the Kapoor divas ensured each garment picked for the wedding gala was an outfit to remember.
Here's a look at some ensembles that took our breath away.
